description:
Inuyasha tells Kaede that Kikyo is still alive. Kagome is depressed that Inuyasha still has feelings for Kikyo.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Der glückbringende, aber zweigleisig fahrende Rüpel
El joven violento que atrae la felicidad
Shiawase o Yobu Futamata Bouryoku Otoko
Um Jovem violento que atrai a Felicidade
幸せを呼ぶフタマタ暴力男
